desscription:
File descriptor for UI micro front-ends.
This file includes all apps, components and groups supported by UI micro front-ends.
This file should be named as 'config.json' and should be accesible from the service root URL.

apps.description: List of applications available as part of the service.

groups.description: List of groups available as part of the service.

components.description: List of components available as part of the service.
